name: silverfort
label: Silverfort
description: Silverfort delivers adaptive authentication across all corporate networks and cloud environments from a unified platform. This integration is used to gather and update risk associated with a user or resource from Silverfort.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Silverfort server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: URL of the Silverfort server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: User ID
fields.name: user_id
fields.description: User ID which you have created on Silverfort which is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.
fields.tooltip: User ID which you have created on Silverfort which is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: User Secret
fields.name: user_secret
fields.description: User Secret of the user that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.
fields.tooltip: User Secret of the user that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get User Risk
operations.description: Retrieves details about risk associated with specific user from Silverfort based on the input parameter you have specified. You can choose among following options: 1.User Principal Name, 2.email & domain or 3.SAM account and domain

parameters.title: User Identification
parameters.name: user_identification
parameters.tooltip: Select one of the method to get details about risk associated with specific user from Silverfort. By default, this option is set as User Principal Name.
parameters.description: Select one of the method to get details about risk associated with specific user from Silverfort. By default, this option is set as User Principal Name.
